item.title: MyDigitAlly
item.description:
Empowering Parents in the Digital Age

MyDigitAlly is a freemium edtech startup that helps non-tech parents confidently navigate their kids’ digital world.

The Problem

Parents today face an impossible challenge: they need to guide their children through a digital landscape they don’t fully understand themselves. The pace of technological change means even tech-savvy parents struggle to keep up with new platforms, risks, and opportunities.

Most resources are either too technical, too judgmental, or too time-consuming for busy parents.

item.title: Stealth Hardware Project
item.description:
Digital Sovereignty for Everyone

An early-stage hardware venture focused on true digital sovereignty - giving individuals complete ownership and control of their digital lives.

The Vision

In a world where our data is constantly extracted, analyzed, and monetized by corporations and governments, we’ve lost agency over our digital selves. Current “privacy” solutions are bandaids on a fundamentally extractive system.

This project explores hardware-based approaches to genuine digital autonomy - infrastructure that puts individuals back in control.

item.title: Hareesh Kanchanepally
item.description:
Hi, I'm Hareesh

Technology Portfolio Director | Product Builder | Founder

Leading product portfolios and agile delivery by day. Building edtech and digital sovereignty tools by night.

Currently: Launching MyDigitAlly (edtech startup for parents) and exploring hardware solutions for digital sovereignty.

item.title: What I'm Doing Now
item.description:
Last updated: November 2024

Current Focus

Building MyDigitAlly

Live edtech startup helping non-tech parents navigate their kids’ digital world with confidence. We’ve launched:

  • Weekly automated newsletter with research-based insights
  • 5-minute e-learning modules for busy parents
  • Custom AI assistant (in development) using RAG + MCP, grounded in our curriculum

Status: Active, growing community of parents

Visit MyDigitAlly â†’

Exploring Stealth Hardware Project

Early-stage hardware venture focused on digital sovereignty and data ownership. Building the infrastructure for genuine digital autonomy.

item.title: About
item.description:
Expert Generalist

I’m a Portfolio Director, founder, and builder focused on creating tools that empower people in the digital age.

What I Do

By Day: I lead product portfolios in agile delivery environments, focusing on prioritization, strategy, and rapid execution. My role centers on getting the right things delivered quickly - balancing stakeholder needs, technical constraints, and business goals.

By Night: I build ventures at the intersection of technology, education, and digital sovereignty:

item.title: Ventures
item.description:
I believe in building things that matter - tools that give people agency, knowledge, and sovereignty in the digital world.

Currently exploring two parallel paths: empowering parents through education (MyDigitAlly) and enabling digital sovereignty through hardware (stealth project).
